name: Turnovus' Sandbox
description:
It started as a practice project whilst learning about physics in the studio I use. I plan to put more work into it for some practice.

To play, left click anywhere to make stuff appear. Press the number keys to choose different items. Your current item, item count, and frame rate are displayed in the upper right-hand corner.

There's still a bit of fun to have with this game, despite being a simple practice. Granted, it'll likely only give you a small chuckle before you uninstall it, but in the meantime, you can:

  • build box forts
  • Play with bombs
  • Launch poorly-coded balloons into space
  • Spawn stick figures
  • Slide things on ice
  • Drop anvils on stick figures
  • Test your box fort against dynamite
  • Destroy stick figures with dynamite
  • Push stuff around with harmless bombs
  • Drop a devastating nuclear bomb to clear out everything
  • And have fun!
